events.body:
ACK

Installed `libzmq` to `/tmp/ROOT`, added `/tmp/ROOT/lib/pkgconfig` to `PKG_CONFIG_PATH`, master build fails. Added the commit https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin/commit/b22692ce3e1669ddeeeb158a0eecedcdbcb1e36d, `autogen.sh`, `configure` and build works!

issue.title: Add ZeroMQ notifications
issue.body:

Closes #2020.
